basics.name: Marc van Andel
basics.label: Developer | Solution Architect | Tech Researcher
basics.summary: I'm loving tech. I've always been interested in tech of all sorts. I do believe in people and 'the greater good'. That's why I'd like to contribute to society by improving the government. Especially the digital government. I'm employed at Kadaster, the Dutch Land and Mapping Agency for a while now and I'm working on innovation and emerging technologies to improve Kadaster and the government as a whole. Besides that I do have my own consultancy company by which I can share my knowledge and expertise outside government boundaries.

work.name: Kadaster
highlights: Software Architect of Core System for Objects and Rights

work.name: Consulmation
work.summary: The great combination of Consultancy and Automation
